doc.field: TOKAI BANK DOUBLES STERLING CD FACILITY

The Tokai Bank Ltd, London Branch, is doubling the size of a sterling certificate of deposit issuance facility established last year to 200 mln stg from the original 100 mln, Chemical Bank International Ltd said as arranger. The increase reflects active use of the facility from the first month after signing and growing international interest from institutional investors at sub-LIBOR (London Interbank Offered Rates) levels. Barclay's de Zoete Wedd Ltd has been added to the group of dealers for the program. REUTER
